description:
Show your love for our forests and green spaces in this soft sustainable hoodie. Wearing a staple of the Pacific Northwest, the lodgepole pine, this hoodie does more than just keep you warm, it also helps with reforestation.

  • Each purchase helps plant trees in areas of the Pacific Northwest that have been affected by wildfires
  • Soft Treeblend fabric is made of recycled and natural fibres, giving you a clean conscience
  • tentree’s goal is to construct quality apparel and ensure that ten trees are planted for every article of clothing sold
  • Oversized fit is just right for snuggling into on chilly days
name: tentree Lodgepole Oversized Hoodie - Women's
